experiment_rna_short_read_id.description:
identifier for experiment_rna_short_read (primary key)

Notes: RCs make their own IDs, must begin with center abbreviation as defined in participant table; need to be globally unique in consortium; may be generated by prepending experiment_sample_id with center abbreviation

experiment_sample_id.description:
identifier used in the data file (e.g. the SM tag in a BAM header, column headers for genotype fields in a VCF file)

Notes: may be the same as experiment_short_read_id if the file does contain sample identifiers
should be present if downstream file contains a sample_id (e.g. BAM, VCF)
some centers have one id for the sample (tube) and a diff ID for the sample as named in the VCF; experiment_sample_id = ID in the VCF file; analyte_id = ID for the tube/aliquot/whatever

seq_library_prep_kit_method.description:
Library prep kit used

Notes: Can be missing if RC receives external data

items.description: depletion kit or list of depletion targets used

read_length.description:
sequenced read length (bp); GREGoR RCs do paired end sequencing, so is the example of 100bp indicates 2x100bp.

Notes: contact the DCC if not doing paired-end or you wish to share data with unknown read length.

date_data_generation.description:
Date of data generation (First sequencing date)

Notes: Can be missing if RC receives external data; ISO 8601 date format

sequencing_platform.description:
sequencing platform used for the experiment

Notes: Can be missing if RC receives external data

within_site_batch_name.description: batch number for the site, important for future batch correction

RIN.description: RIN number for quality of sample

total_reads.description:
total number of reads

Notes: float type required for large number, but value entered should be an integer
